response.overview: Love & New Notes is a 2026 Nigerian romantic drama set against the backdrop of the historic 1984 currency change in Nigeria. The film follows Boma, a young man navigating the economic upheaval alongside his loved ones as personal dreams, relationships, and ambitions are tested by sudden societal shifts. As Boma and others grapple with financial uncertainty and emotional challenges, love, loyalty, and resilience become central in their struggle to protect family and secure a future. The story blends heartfelt romance with moments of tension and humour, capturing the complexity of human connection in times of change
response.title: Love & New Notes
